channel.title: Comments on: This just in… Bill Gates Blows
channel.description: One for the money, two for the show...

item.title: By: Grammy
item.dc:creator: Grammy
item.description: Hi Justin, Just want to let you know that I read your website. It's always interesting! Gramp just said that WVU won today. Yay!!! Love, Gram
item.content:encoded:
Hi Justin, Just want to let you know that I read your website. It’s always interesting! Gramp just said that WVU won today. Yay!!!
Love,
Gram
